channel.title: [317][DELTA] How do I make players never auto log out? (Stay online)
channel.description: How do I make it so you never auto log out? So you can go AFK for like a few hours and still be online? thx

item.title: [317][DELTA] How do I make players never auto log out? (Stay online)
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Search for the logout method being called in client class. So search for logout(); and you will see this:

	case 202:
			// idle logout packet
			 if(!inCombat)
			 logout();
			 break;

Simply comment out the logout(); so it doesnâ€™t log them out at all.

Read full topic
item.source: [317][DELTA] How do I make players never auto log out? (Stay online)
